title: कांग्रेस नेताओं का ग़लत आरोप, अरनब गोस्वामी ने ‘हमले’ से पहले ही नहीं बना लिया था वीडियो
author: www.altnews.in
vclaim:
🔸Arnab has a Y category security 🔸His security guards caught the attackers, who then talked at great length & were let off?😂 🔸Why were they not handed over to the Police? 🔸Also metadata of the video put up by #Repuplick suggests it was shot much before the alleged incident pic.twitter.com/mXNOj5Anag

UNESCO must declare Arnab the Worst Actor ever

– Arnab has Y security cover but somehow was still attacked

 – Attackers were caught & they confessed but were let go 😂

 – Patra knew abt attack even before the attack happened 🤔

Looks like Vivek Agnihotri directed this flop show! pic.twitter.com/BmX0MFkTL6
